name: Terrakion
description: It has phenomenal power. It will mercilessly crush anyone or anything that bullies small Pokémon.

attacks.name: Guard Press
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Earthen Power
attacks.effect: If you have a Stadium in play, this attack does 80 more damage.
